description: Use your Echo to translate words and phrases. Supported languages: Spanish, French, Portuguese, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Hebrew, Russian, Polish
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask My Translator to translate water into Spanish
Alexa, ask My Translator the word for cherry in French
Alexa, ask My Translator how do I say where is the restroom in Chinese
name: My Translator by Vonage
shortDescription: Use your Echo to translate words and phrases.
